meanings.definition: The act of allowing someone to enter a place or join an organization.
meanings.sent1: The admission to the zoo was free for children under five.
meanings.sent2: She purchased her admission ticket to the concert online.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's admission into the polar bear club was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His admission into the exclusive club opened new doors for him.
meanings.sent5: The admission into the enchanted forest was granted only to those who believed in magic.

meanings.definition: The money paid for entrance to a place or event.
meanings.sent1: The admission fee to the museum was quite affordable.
meanings.sent2: He forgot to bring cash for the admission to the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The admission cost to the movie theater was worth every penny.
meanings.sent4: Her admission fee to the concert was a small price to pay for a memorable night.
meanings.sent5: The admission charge to the exhibition helped support local artists.

meanings.definition: A statement acknowledging the truth of something.
meanings.sent1: His admission of guilt in court surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The admission of her mistake showed her honesty.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's admission that it ate the cookies was comical.
meanings.sent4: Her admission of defeat in the game was met with cheers from her opponents.
meanings.sent5: The admission of the error led to a quick resolution of the issue.
